name: Zeliria Sanctuary - Rise of Pumpkins
detailed_description:
Our heroes decided to go to the village where Pumpkin Witch rages. Will they be able to reach the goal or will they be scared and turn back? Will each of them survive? You'll find all the answers in this DLC. New journeys and new heroes, difficult choices and their results are waiting for you.

Who is isle? Is Morgana dangerous? Will Havoc shed light on what is happening on the planet? Just play and learn.

Do not forget - any choice you make has consequences. Have you been kind to Leeka? Did you respect Velga? Be careful, because anything can happen.

And remember: everything here is not what it seems.
about_the_game:
Our heroes decided to go to the village where Pumpkin Witch rages. Will they be able to reach the goal or will they be scared and turn back? Will each of them survive? You'll find all the answers in this DLC. New journeys and new heroes, difficult choices and their results are waiting for you.

Who is isle? Is Morgana dangerous? Will Havoc shed light on what is happening on the planet? Just play and learn.

Do not forget - any choice you make has consequences. Have you been kind to Leeka? Did you respect Velga? Be careful, because anything can happen.

And remember: everything here is not what it seems.
short_description: More adventures of Special Forces soldier Maxx on a distant planet Zeliria.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 850 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
